name: Nick Cameron
notes:
I work on the Rust compiler, language design, and tooling ([DXR](https://github.com/nick29581/dxr/tree/rust2)). I'm part of the research team at Mozilla.

Other interesting stuff:
* [rust-highfive](https://github.com/nick29581/highfive) a bot that roams the rust repos being helpful
* [libhoare](https://github.com/nick29581/libhoare) pre- and postconditions for Rust
*[rustaceans.org](https://github.com/nick29581/rustaceans-src) this website
